subject: HS Pro Shifter
description_text:
Hello everyone, 

unfortunately I had to find out that the 7th and reverse gear are swapped on my new HS Pro Shifter. 
When I'm in the 7th Gear shift, the software shows me the R gear, and just the other way around.
How can I solve this problem?
I think a plug is swapped?


Best regards  

P. Reckerth

conversations.body_text: Hi Philipp Reckerth,    Please download the latest SIMSONN Manager 2.1.3, select 7R mode, and recalibrate all gears.  During calibration, please shift through the gears in the following order: 1 → 2 → 3 → 4 → 5 → 6 → 7 → R.  Once calibration is completed successfully, the device should work properly and allow normal mode switching.

Hi, 

I have already loaded the latest firmware and performed the calibration. Even in the calibration it is misrepresented or assumed. There, too, the R gear is displayed instead of the 7th and vice versa.

Hi Philipp Reckerth,  Please click the Revert button first, then click Save to restore the configuration. After that, recalibrate the device. If there are any display issues during calibration, you can ignore them and proceed with the calibration.
